name.baseName: raw meal preparation;raw meal;new dry process, >4000 t/d
生料制备;生料;新型干法, >4000 t/d

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The new dry process has a relatively large market share in the cement industry process. The contaminant in the raw material preparation process is particulate matter.
新型干法在水泥工业工艺中市场份额占比较大。生料制备过程污染物为颗粒物。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The new dry process described is utilized in the cement industry, specifically for the creation of raw meal used in the production of P·O 42.5 type cement clinker. The process is designed to handle a throughput of more than 4000 tons per day of raw meal. Its application is targeted towards large-scale cement manufacturing facilities where pollution control for particulate matter is critical during raw meal preparation.
新型干法用于水泥行业中生料的生产，具体用途为生产P·O 42.5型水泥熟料。该工艺设计用于处理每天超过4000吨的生料。其应用针对的是大型水泥制造设施，在生料制备过程中对颗粒物污染控制至关重要。

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: Taking P·O 42.5 type cement clinker as the research object, the functional unit and base flow are the production of 1.00 tons of cement clinker, and the base year is 2020. The system boundary is the unit process of raw meal preparation (raw material mining, raw material pretreatment and homogenization, raw meal grinding and raw meal homogenization). The real-life process ranges from raw material preprocessing and batching to raw meal homogenization.
以 P·O 42.5 型水泥熟料为研究对象，功能单位与基准流为生产 1.00 吨水泥熟料，基准年为 2020 年。系统边界为生料制备（原料开采、原料预处理及均化、生料粉磨和生料均化）单元过程，实景过程范围从原料预处理及配料到生料均化为止。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: Data on limestone mining, shale mining, sandstone mining, iron powder production, coal mining, electricity and tap water production, and direct pollutant emissions were obtained from the CLCD-China-ECER 0.8 database.
石灰石开采、页岩开采、砂岩开采、铁粉生产、煤开采、电力和自来水生产以及直接排放污染物等数据均来自 CLCD-China-ECER 0.8 数据库中的数据。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: In addition to CO2, other data come from corporate reports such as Gaoan Red Lion and Jiangxi De'an Evergreen, the cement industry's cleaner production evaluation index system, and cement clinker research papers.
除CO2外，其他数据来源于高安红狮、江西德安万年青等企业报告、水泥行业清洁生产评价指标体系及水泥熟料研究论文等。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 陆柳鲜. (2022). 江西省多源有色冶炼固废资源化过程生命周期评价研究 [硕士, 江西理工大学].
陆柳鲜. (2022). 江西省多源有色冶炼固废资源化过程生命周期评价研究 [硕士, 江西理工大学].

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this LCA data for the new dry process in cement production, adherence to the CLCD trade-off principles is essential, as outlined: neglect upstream production data of raw materials weighing less than 1% of the product; ignore upstream production of waste or low-value waste materials; generally overlook production equipment, buildings, amenities; and do not ignore known emissions within the environmental impact scope. This dataset is derived from the CLCD-China-ECER 0.8 database. Consider the technology's representativeness and the specific geographical location when applying this data. Pay special attention to the inventory uncertainty assessments and the uncertainty impacts calculated using analytical formulae to reflect accurate LCA results.

使用此水泥生产新型干法的生命周期评价(LCA)数据时，必须遵守CLCD取舍原则：忽略原料重量小于产品重量1%的上游生产数据；忽略作为原料的废弃物或低价值废物的上游生产；通常可以忽略生产设备、建筑物、生活设施；不应忽略环境影响范围内的已知排放。此数据集来源于CLCD-China-ECER 0.8数据库。在应用此数据时，考虑技术的代表性和具体的地理位置。特别注意库存不确定性评估和使用分析公式计算的不确定性影响，以反映准确的LCA结果。

completeness.common:other: This study utilizes the basic life cycle database developed by Yike Environmental Technology Co., Ltd., and adheres to the CLCD trade-off principle. The following details apply: (1) Raw material upstream production data can be ignored when the weight of raw materials is less than 1% of product weight, and the weight of materials containing rare/high purity is less than 0.1% of the product weight. Additionally, the total weight of the raw material is less than or equal to 5% of the total weight. (2) Waste or low-value waste used as raw material does not require tracing of its upstream production process. (3) In most cases, production equipment, plant buildings, living facilities, etc. can be ignored. (4) Known emission data within the scope of the selected environmental impact type should not be ignored.The CLCD method is used as the data quality assessment method in this study. This method evaluates the resource consumption and pollutant emission data in the cement clinker LCA model from four aspects, such as inventory data sources and algorithms, years, locations and technical representativeness, to obtain the uncertainty brought by matching with the database, and then completes the inventory uncertainty assessment after correlating the background database base uncertainty. The uncertainty is calculated by the method of analytical formula to transfer and accumulate the uncertainty, and finally the uncertainty of LCA results of cement clinker production process is obtained.

本研究采用亿科环境科技有限公司开发的生命周期基础数据库，研究需符合CLCD取舍原则，详情如下：（一）当原料重量<1%产品重量及含稀贵/高纯度物料重量<0.1%产品重量时，忽略该原料上游生产数据，总共忽略原料总重量≤5%；（二）废弃物或低价值废物作原料时不追溯其上游生产过程；（三）生产设备、厂房、生活设施等在大多数情况下可忽略；（四）不应忽略已选定环境影响类型范围内的已知排放数据。采用CLCD法作为本研究的数据质量评估方法，此法对水泥熟料LCA模型里的资源消耗和染物排放数据从清单数据来源和算法、年份、所在地及技术代表性等四方面加以评估，获取与数据库匹配带来的不确定度，再关联背景数据库基础不确定度后完成清单不确定度评估，运用解析公式法算出不确定度的传递和累积，最终得到水泥熟料生产过程LCA结果不确定度。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Electricity. Electricity is supplied from power plants.

Particulate matter, with an unspecified particle size, is treated as PM > 10 micrometers in diameter. The particulate matter collected by the bag filter is returned to the raw material homogenization stage through the recycling system, and the solid waste generated during the process can be effectively recycled and reused.
颗粒物。袋式收尘器收集到的粉尘经返料系统全部返回生料均化阶段，工艺产出固废可有效循环利用。未标明粒径，按PM>10处理。
